Instruction to build the game.
= Introduction =
To build this game, please follow the instructions given below.
= Details =
1) Download the source code. All the source files are in ..pacman-game/src/ folder.
2)Change the current directory to the src. [$cd pacman-game/src/ ]
3) Run the following commands in order
   $touch game.cpp
   $make game
   $c++ pacman_game.cpp

4)Once all the compilation is done. Run a.out to start the game.
   $./a.out
